name: WiiTCPLoad
tagline: A simple Qt application to send homebrew applications to the Homebrew Channel
body:
WiiTCPLoad
==========

WiiTCPLoad is an application to send homebrew to your Wii running the [Homebrew Channel](http://hbc.hackmii.com/).  It supports both .dol and .elf files and compressing them for a faster transfer rate.  You can optionally send arguments to the application when it runs.  WiiTCPLoad was originally created by Strikeu, along with modifications for OS X from Tinman, at http://sourceforge.net/projects/wiitcpload/.  This version has been updated to support the latest Homebrew Channel.

Downloads
=========
[Windows](http://fostermclane.tk/wiitcpload/wiitcpload-win32.exe)

Mac OS X - Someone with Mac OS X needs to build this

[Linux 32-bit](http://fostermclane.tk/wiitcpload/wiitcpload-linux-x86)

[Linux 64-bit](http://fostermclane.tk/wiitcpload/wiitcpload-linux-x86_64)
